text: "This Time Around" is a song by American singer Michael Jackson from his 1995 album HIStory: Past, Present and Future, Book I, with a guest appearance by rapper the Notorious B.I.G. The track features a blend of pop, rock, and R&B; elements, showcasing Jackson's distinctive vocal style and emotive delivery. "This Time Around" touches on themes of resilience and determination in the face of challenges, reflecting his experiences in the music industry and his personal life. The song was co-written by Michael Jackson, and it includes a prominent use of percussion and a catchy melody. While it wasn't released as a single in the United States, it received positive reviews from fans and critics alike for its production and lyrical content.
title: This Time Around (Michael Jackson song)
